item.title: #1 Altis Invade and Annex
item.description: See the main server for server description and rules Mods When Event Required Mods Optional Mods HTML Tool Last Updated Vanilla x Huge Allowed Mods List x 08-30-2023 Fri@9pm Assault and Pepper x Huge Allowed Mods List >NAK Modset Manager< 08-30-2023 Events Assault and Pepper, Combined Operations Friday @ 9pm Eastern/US Runs late into the night, until we run out of players Required Mods for event Any allowed mods Event rules If you are joining the event you must be in the event channel in teamspeak.

item.title: NAK#2 Public Modded Zeus
item.description: See the main server for server description and rules Please complete the Zeus Survey for every zeus mission to take part in. It helps to improve the quality of the missions and the enjoyment of the servers for everyone. This server has required mods. Mods When Event Required Mods Optional Mods HTML Tool Last Updated Old Unsung Collection Collection NAK Modset Manager 07-22-2023 Current–> Base Collection Collection >NAK Modset Manager< 08-26-2023 Events NakTac Event Days and Time to be Determined Required Mods for event Required Mods for event TBD Test mods Event rules There are special rules for this event There are qualifications to join the unit.

item.title: NAK#3 Tanoa Quicksilver
item.description: See the main server for server description and rules Mods When Event Required Mods Optional Mods HTML Tool Last Updated Vanilla x Huge Allowed Mods List x 08-30-2023 Tue@7pm Tanoa Tac Tuesday x Huge Allowed Mods List >NAK Modset Manager< 08-30-2023 Events Tactical Tuesday Tuesdays @ 7pm Eastern/US Runs until server restart at 9pm Required Mods for event Any allowed mods Please do not run RHS as it breaks sound for others on this server.

item.title: #4 Public Vanilla Zeus
item.description: See the main server for server description and rules When joining from the launcher click the “Keep Current Loaded Mods” button not the top one. Please complete the Zeus Survey for every zeus mission to take part in. It helps to improve the quality of the missions and the enjoyment of the servers for everyone. Mods When Event Required Mods Optional Mods HTML Tool Last Updated Wed@7pm BirdOps x Huge Allowed Mods List >NAK Modset Manager< 08-30-2023 Sat@5pm NakOps x see modset manager >NAK Modset Manager< 08-30-2023 Vanilla x Huge Allowed Mods List x 08-30-2023 Events NAK Ops Saturday @ 5pm Eastern/US Runs 2-3 hours depending on the size and complexity of the mission.

item.title: General Info
item.description: Some of the things you can expect. Voice Communication Your microphone must be well adjusted and you must be able to communicate clearly. If you are in an environment with a lot of background noise, you may be required to use push-to-talk. Eating is not allowed during our operations, it is only allowed while your microphone is muted in the following situations: Spectator Pre-mission Post-debrief Roleplay This is a light roleplay unit.

item.title: #n SnyOps
item.description: Who let you in here? How do you know about this place? SECURITY!\ This server is completely experimental and is subject to change at any time. However, this does not mean there are no rules. See the main server for server description and rules This is where I will be testing new mods and missions. Mods (last updated 08-26-2023) HTML Events none scheduled. NAK#n SnyOps

item.title: New Mod Tool
item.description: NAK has a new Modset Tool that allows the Servers and Events team to update mods without having to manually generate and distribute PRESET HTML files. This will allow for faster updates and more accurate mod pack information. To use, select Server Info from the SnyOps main page and click on the server you want to get the mod list for. Click on the Nak Modset Manager link. Select the Optional mods you want to use.

item.title: New HTMLs
item.description: New Sny Recommended HTMLs uploaded for all servers.

item.title: New Site
item.description: Welcome to the new server info site. This will contain both information and news about the Nak servers, events, mods and highlight and link to any changes that relate to using Nak servers. If you see anything broken please let me know, Sny
